servinfo.title: Gear Shift Control Lever Rear Case Assembly Inspection

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Gear Shift Control Lever Rear Case Assembly Disassembly and Reassembly

item.ptxt: Check that gear shift control shaft moves smoothly without abnormal noise. If abnormality is found, replace defective part.
Check bush and boot for damage and deterioration. If abnormality is found, replace defective part.
